application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration AreaNorth West London
description: Submission of details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 5 (materials) addressing: Sample glazing with window/door frame(s); Balustrade and edge detail; Roofing materials, including roof parapets; Typical rainwater goods and other materials including GRC Panels, and Condition 8 (Cycle Parking details) relating to the on plot cycle store only as well as full discharge of Conditions 6 (Architectural Detailing) of the Plot 25 reserved matters approval in Phase 4A reference 21/4063/RMA dated 22/10/2021 (as amended by 23/0869/NMA dated 28/04/2023) of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood.
